title: Change in Exponential - from a sequence

content.question: ​The fourth term of a geometric sequence is <math alttext="7"><semantics><mn>7</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, the fifth term is <math alttext="28 over 3"><semantics><mfrac><mn>28</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and the <math alttext="k text th end text"><semantics><mrow><mi>k</mi><mtext>th</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> term is <math alttext="7168 over 243"><semantics><mfrac><mn>7168</mn><mn>243</mn></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. The solution to which of the following equations gives the value of <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="4 open parentheses 3 over 4 close parentheses to the power of open parentheses x minus 7 close parentheses end exponent equals 7168 over 243"><semantics><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mfenced><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>7168</mn><mn>243</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="7 open parentheses 3 over 4 close parentheses to the power of open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses end exponent equals 7168 over 243"><semantics><mrow><mn>7</mn><msup><mfenced><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>7168</mn><mn>243</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="4 open parentheses 4 over 3 close parentheses to the power of open parentheses x minus 7 close parentheses end exponent equals 7168 over 243"><semantics><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mfenced><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>7168</mn><mn>243</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="7 open parentheses 4 over 3 close parentheses to the power of open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses end exponent equals 7168 over 243"><semantics><mrow><mn>7</mn><msup><mfenced><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>7168</mn><mn>243</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="7 open parentheses 4 over 3 close parentheses to the power of open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses end exponent equals 7168 over 243"><semantics><mrow><mn>7</mn><msup><mfenced><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>7168</mn><mn>243</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

topic.text: 2.2: Change in Linear and Exponential Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
